00023 #define COORDINATE_REQUEST_PRIO        DEFAULT_PACKET_PRIO
00024 #define COORDINATE_REQUEST_MAX_LENGTH  (REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE+64)
00025 #define COORDINATE_REPLY_PRIO          DEFAULT_PACKET_PRIO

00058 class CoordinateRequestPacket : public RequestPacket {
00059 public:
00060    
00061    static const int LAT_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE;
00062    static const int LON_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 4;
00063    static const int OUTDATA_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 8;
00064    static const int ANGLE_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 12;
00065    static const int RESERV_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 14;
00066    static const int LANGUAGE_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 16; 
00067    static const int ALLOWED_NBR_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 20; 
00068    static const int FIRST_WANTED_ITEM_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 21; 
00069    static const int SECOND_WANTED_ITEM_POS = REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE + 22; 
00070    
00071 #  define COORDINATE_PACKET_RESULT_ANGLE    0x00000001 
00072 #  define COORDINATE_PACKET_RESULT_STRINGS  0x00000002 
00073 #  define COORDINATE_PACKET_RESULT_IDS      0x00000004 
00074       
00088    CoordinateRequestPacket(
00089                            uint16 packetID,  
00090                            uint16 requestID,  
00091                            int32 lat,  
00092                            int32 lon, 
00093                            uint32 originIP = 0, 
00094                            uint16 originPort = 0, 
00095                            uint16 angle = MAX_UINT16, 
00096                            LangTypes::language_t language = 
00097                            LangTypes::english );  //default english  
00098          
00103    int32 getLatitude() const { 
00104       return (readLong(LAT_POS)); 
00105    }; 
00106    
00111    int32 getLongitude() const { 
00112       return (readLong(LON_POS)); 
00113    }; 
00114    
00119    void addOutDataType(uint32 t) { 
00120       uint32 curOutData = readLong(OUTDATA_POS); 
00121       curOutData |= t; 
00122       writeLong(OUTDATA_POS, curOutData); 
00123    } 
00124    
00125    uint32 getOutDataType() const { 
00126       return (readLong(OUTDATA_POS)); 
00127    } 
00128    
00129    uint16 getAngle() const { 
00130       return (readShort(ANGLE_POS)); 
00131    } 
00132    
00133    uint32 getLanguage() const { 
00134       return (readLong(LANGUAGE_POS)); 
00135    } 
00136    
00142    byte getNbrItemTypes() const { 
00143       return (readByte(ALLOWED_NBR_POS)); 
00144    }; 
00145    
00152    byte getItemType(byte i) const {
00153       if ( i < getNbrItemTypes() ) 
00154          return (readByte(FIRST_WANTED_ITEM_POS+i));
00155       else
00156          return MAX_UINT8; 
00157    };
00158    
00164    void addItemType(byte type) {
00165       int position = getLength();
00166       incWriteByte(position, type);
00167       setLength(position);
00168       writeByte(ALLOWED_NBR_POS, getNbrItemTypes()+1);
00169    };
00170    
00171 };

00173 // Maybe these should be member constants.
00174 #define COORD_REPLY_MAP_ID_POS         (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE)
00175 #define COORD_REPLY_ITEM_ID_POS        (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+4)
00176 #define COORD_REPLY_DIST_POS           (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+8)
00177 #define COORD_REPLY_OFFSET_POS         (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+12)
00178 #define COORD_REPLY_POS_ANGLE_POS      (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+14)
00179 #define COORD_REPLY_NEG_ANGLE_POS      (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+16)
00180 // PADDING
00181 #define COORD_REPLY_MUNICIPAL_POS      (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+20)
00182 #define COORD_REPLY_CITY_PART_POS      (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+24)
00183 #define COORD_REPLY_BUILT_AREA_POS     (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+28)
00184 #define COORD_REPLY_COUNTRY_ID_POS     (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+32)
00185 #define COORD_REPLY_ORIGINAL_LAT_POS   (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+36)
00186 #define COORD_REPLY_ORIGINAL_LON_POS   (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+40)
00187 // Map-IDs that are used if the coordinate is located in more than one map
00188 #define COORD_REPLY_FIRST_MAPID        (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+44)
00189 #define COORD_REPLY_STRING_START       (REPLY_HEADER_SIZE+108)
00190 
00191 #define MAX_NBR_MAP_IDS                (16)

00242 class CoordinateReplyPacket : public ReplyPacket {
00243 public:
00260    CoordinateReplyPacket(  const CoordinateRequestPacket* p,
00261                            uint32 status,
00262                            uint32 mapID,
00263                            uint32 itemID,
00264                            uint16 offset,
00265                            uint32 dist,
00266                            uint16 posAngle = MAX_UINT16, 
00267                            uint16 negAngle = MAX_UINT16,
00268                            uint32 countryID = MAX_UINT32,
00269                            uint32 municipalID = MAX_UINT32,
00270                            uint32 builtUpAreaID = MAX_UINT32,
00271                            uint32 cityPartID = MAX_UINT32 
00272                            )
00273       
00274          : ReplyPacket( COORDINATE_MAX_REPLY_LENGTH,
00275                         Packet::PACKETTYPE_COORDINATEREPLY,
00276                         p, status) {
00277       
00278       writeLong(COORD_REPLY_MAP_ID_POS, mapID);
00279       mc2dbg4 << "mapID written, " << mapID << endl;
00280       writeLong(COORD_REPLY_ITEM_ID_POS, itemID);
00281       mc2dbg4 << "itemID written, " << itemID << endl;
00282       writeLong(COORD_REPLY_DIST_POS, dist);
00283       mc2dbg4 << "dist written, " << dist << endl;
00284       writeShort(COORD_REPLY_OFFSET_POS, offset);
00285       mc2dbg4 << "offset written, " << offset << endl;
00286       writeShort(COORD_REPLY_POS_ANGLE_POS, posAngle);
00287       mc2dbg4 << "posAngle written, " << posAngle << endl;
00288       writeShort(COORD_REPLY_NEG_ANGLE_POS, negAngle);
00289       mc2dbg4 << "negAngle written, " << negAngle << endl;
00290       writeLong(COORD_REPLY_MUNICIPAL_POS, municipalID);
00291       mc2dbg4 << "municipalID written, " << municipalID << endl;
00292       writeLong(COORD_REPLY_CITY_PART_POS, cityPartID);
00293       mc2dbg4 << "cityPartID writted, " << cityPartID << endl;
00294       writeLong(COORD_REPLY_BUILT_AREA_POS, builtUpAreaID);
00295       mc2dbg4 << "BuiltUpAreaID written, " << builtUpAreaID << endl;
00296       writeLong(COORD_REPLY_COUNTRY_ID_POS, countryID);
00297       mc2dbg4 << "Country code written, " << countryID << endl;
00298       
00299       // Set the original cooridnate
00300       setOriginalCoordinate(p->getLatitude(), p->getLongitude());
00301       
00302       // Reset all possible map IDs
00303       for (int i=0; i<MAX_NBR_MAP_IDS; i++) {
00304          writeLong(COORD_REPLY_FIRST_MAPID + i*4, MAX_UINT32);
00305       }
00306       
00307       // Write some empty strings (will also set the length of 
00308       // the packet)
00309       writeStrings(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00310    };
00311

00519 inline bool 
00520 CoordinateReplyPacket::setOriginalCoordinate(int32 lat, int32 lon)
00521 {
00522    writeLong(COORD_REPLY_ORIGINAL_LAT_POS, lat);
00523    writeLong(COORD_REPLY_ORIGINAL_LON_POS, lon);
00524    return (true);
00525 }
00526 
00527 inline bool 
00528 CoordinateReplyPacket::getOriginalCoordinate(int32& lat, int32& lon) const
00529 {
00530    lat = readLong(COORD_REPLY_ORIGINAL_LAT_POS);
00531    lon = readLong(COORD_REPLY_ORIGINAL_LON_POS);
00532    return (true);
00533 }

00549 inline bool 
00550 CoordinateReplyPacket::addPossibleMap(uint32 mapID)
00551 {
00552    uint32 n = getNbrPossibleMaps();
00553    if (n < MAX_NBR_MAP_IDS) {
00554       writeLong(COORD_REPLY_FIRST_MAPID+n*4, mapID);
00555       return (true);
00556    } else {
00557       return (false);
00558    }
00559 }
00560 
00561 inline uint32 
00562 CoordinateReplyPacket::getNbrPossibleMaps() const
00563 {
00564    int pos = COORD_REPLY_FIRST_MAPID;
00565    while ( (((pos-COORD_REPLY_FIRST_MAPID)/4) < MAX_NBR_MAP_IDS) && 
00566            (readLong(pos) < MAX_UINT32)) {
00567       pos += 4;
00568    }
00569 
00570    return ((pos-COORD_REPLY_FIRST_MAPID)/4);
00571 }
00572 
00573 inline uint32 
00574 CoordinateReplyPacket::getPossibleMap(byte i) const
00575 {
00576    return readLong(COORD_REPLY_FIRST_MAPID + 4*i);
00577 }
00578 
00579 
00580 inline bool 
00581 CoordinateReplyPacket::writeStrings(const char* country,
00582              const char* municipal,
00583              const char* city,
00584              const char* district,
00585              const char* name)
00586 {
00587    int position = COORD_REPLY_STRING_START;
00588    // Write the country
00589    if (country != NULL) {
00590       incWriteString(position, country);
00591    } else {
00592       incWriteString(position, "");
00593    }
00594 
00595    // Write the municipal
00596    if (municipal != NULL) {
00597       incWriteString(position, municipal);
00598    } else {
00599       incWriteString(position, "");
00600    }
00601 
00602    // Write the city
00603    if (city != NULL) {
00604       incWriteString(position, city);
00605    } else {
00606       incWriteString(position, "");
00607    }
00608 
00609    // Write the district
00610    if (district != NULL) {
00611       incWriteString(position, district);
00612    } else {
00613       incWriteString(position, "");
00614    }
00615 
00616    // Write the name
00617    if (name != NULL) {
00618       incWriteString(position, name);
00619    } else {
00620       incWriteString(position, "");
00621    }
00622 
00623    // Set length and return
00624    setLength(position);
00625    return (true);
00626 }
00627 
00628 inline bool 
00629 CoordinateReplyPacket::getStrings(char* country,
00630                                   char* municipal,
00631                                   char* city,
00632                                   char* district,
00633                                   char* name,
00634                                   int maxSize) const
00635 {
00636    int position = COORD_REPLY_STRING_START;
00637    char* tmpStr;
00638 
00639    // Get country
00640    incReadString(position, tmpStr);
00641    StringUtility::strlcpy(country, tmpStr, maxSize);
00642 
00643    // Get municipal
00644    incReadString(position, tmpStr);
00645    StringUtility::strlcpy(municipal, tmpStr, maxSize);
00646 
00647    // Get city
00648    incReadString(position, tmpStr);
00649    StringUtility::strlcpy(city, tmpStr, maxSize);
00650 
00651    // Get district
00652    incReadString(position, tmpStr);
00653    StringUtility::strlcpy(district, tmpStr, maxSize);
00654 
00655    // Get name
00656    incReadString(position, tmpStr);
00657    StringUtility::strlcpy(name, tmpStr, maxSize);
00658 
00659    // Return
00660    return (true);
00661 }
